articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Ava Labs, the company behind the development of the Avalanche blockchain, is reportedly in the process of raising a new round of funding.
articles.title: Ava Labs Raises $350M to Build Out Avalanche at $5.25B Valuation: Report

articles.author: Scott Chipolina
articles.description: Elon Musk has made an offer to purchase '100% of Twitter' stock, following his earlier purchase of a 9.2% stake in the social media giant.
articles.title: Elon Musk Offers to Buy '100% of Twitter' for $43 Billion

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The researchers’ model can complete in half an hour what would take a regular PC longer than a human lifetime.
articles.title: Bank of Canada Using Quantum Computing to Simulate Crypto Adoption Scenarios

articles.author: Scott Chipolina
articles.description: The crypto market has been in a week-long slump, but some decentralized finance (DeFi) assets are defying market trends.
articles.title: Thorchain, Compound Lead DeFi Recovery With Double-Digit Gains

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The move risks confusing a crypto-savvy population, as policymakers debate how to regulate the sector.
articles.title: Major Indian Crypto Exchanges Halt Deposits Amid Regulatory Uncertainty: Report

articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: Circle projects $438 million in revenue from its USDC stablecoin reserves for this year and $2.2 billion in 2023.
articles.title: BlackRock to Handle Circle's USDC Cash Reserves as Part of $400M Funding Round

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Shark Tank’s Kevin O’Leary and CEO Jordan Fried share their plans to debut a community-governed NFT marketplace.
articles.title: No VCs Allowed: How NFT.com Aims to Take On OpenSea

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Over 70% of voters in a Wikimedia Foundation poll were against the platform receiving cryptocurrency donations.
articles.title: Most Wikipedia Community Members Want Crypto Donations Banned: Poll

articles.author: Robert Stevens
articles.description: The Ethereum mainnet is due to merge with the Beacon Chain in 2022, completing the blockchain's transition from proof of work to proof of stake.
articles.title: What Is ‘The Merge’? Ethereum’s Move to Proof of Stake

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The institutional version of ConsenSys’s MetaMask can now be used for Gnosis Safe, Hex Trust, Parfin, and GK8.
articles.title: MetaMask Institutional Adds Ethereum Gnosis Safe, Custody Options for DAOs and DeFi

articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: Commercial paper, a type of unsecured debt issued by companies, constitutes 30% of Tether's reserves.
articles.title: Tether Promises to Continue Cutting Commercial Paper Holdings

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The popular NFL team is the first to sign a cryptocurrency exchange as a sponsor following a recent league rule change.
articles.title: Dallas Cowboys Lasso NFL's First Crypto Exchange Sponsor Blockchain.com

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: The nonprofit is converting stablecoin reserves from LUNA into BTC.
articles.title: Luna Foundation Guard Adds Another $100 Million in Bitcoin to Back Terra

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The Rams, Giants, and Buccaneers are among Socios’ new allies, but there are no NFL team tokens yet due to league restrictions.
articles.title: 'Fan Token' Platform Socios Signs 13 NFL Teams

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Binance announced a €100 million investment in France back in November. Now it’s moving into Paris start-up incubator Station F.
articles.title: Binance CEO CZ Praises France’s ‘Pro-Crypto Regulations’

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Chainalysis adds support for 'Internet of Blockchains' Cronos to its Know Your Transaction (KYT) software.
articles.title: Chainalysis Adds 'Internet of Blockchains' Cronos to Its Compliance Software

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The Ethereum 2.0 upgrade that will see the network switch to proof of stake will come ‘in the few months after’ June, according to devs.
articles.title: Ethereum Merge Pushed to Q3 as 'Final Chapter' of Proof of Work Looms

articles.author: Scott Chipolina
articles.description: Crypto platform Luno has partnered with KOKO, a well-known music venue in Camden, London, in a deal that will offer perks to Luno customers.
articles.title: Luno Partners With London Music Venue KOKO As Crypto Moves Beyond Sports Deals

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Users’ privacy is at stake as the social media giant’s metaverse push gathers steam, argues Facebook whistleblower Frances Haugen.
articles.title: Facebook Whistleblower Rebukes Meta's 'Grandiose Promises' for Metaverse Safety

articles.author: Scott Chipolina
articles.description: The Nexo Card will enable users to access a crypto credit line, using their digital assets as collateral rather than spending them.
articles.title: Nexo Partners with Mastercard, DiPocket to Launch Crypto Card

articles.author: Scott Chipolina
articles.description: Sega’s five-year ‘Super Game’ plan will see it develop titles that "go beyond the traditional framework of games".
articles.title: Sega Lays Groundwork for Metaverse With 'Super Game' NFT Plan

articles.author: Jeff John Roberts
articles.description: NFT artist Emily Yang, aka pplpleasr, explains her creative process, and her path to becoming one of the leading lights of the crypto art scene.
articles.title: The Life of a Crypto Artist: Pplpleasr on NFTs, Memes and 'Idea Sex'

articles.author: Scott Chipolina
articles.description: Shiba Inu and ApeCoin are up around 20% and 10% respectively, despite the wider crypto market slumping.
articles.title: SHIB, ApeCoin Defy Crypto Market Slump With Double-Digit Gains

articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: MoonPay followed up a $555 million Series A with a celeb-packed investment round that includes Gwyneth Paltrow, Gal Gadot and Brie Larson.
articles.title: Steve Aoki, Ashton Kutcher, Paris Hilton Join $87 Million MoonPay Investment Group

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Genies, which has an NFT marketplace on Dapper Labs’ Flow blockchain, is promising users “full commercialization rights” over characters.
articles.title: Avatar Platform Genies Now Worth $1B After $150M Series C Round

articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: The venture capital firm is building its war chest as spending on Web3 ramps up.
articles.title: Pantera Says It's Raised $1.3 Billion for Blockchain Fund, Plans to Raise More in 2023

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Though the transaction count and fees are down, Bitcoin mining has become more difficult than ever.
articles.title: Bitcoin Mining Competition Soars Despite Declining On-Chain Activity

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: An Ethereum wallet went on a token shopping spree, focusing entirely on assets Coinbase later revealed it is considering listing. Those tokens have jumped in price by 42%.
articles.title: Ethereum Trader Bought $400K in Tokens on Coinbase Shortlist—Before It Was Public

articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: Last call for token rewards on Earn accounts.
articles.title: Celsius Phasing Out High-Interest Crypto Accounts for Non-Accredited US Investors

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Griffith was arrested in 2019 and charged with conspiring to help North Koreans evade sanctions via cryptocurrency.
articles.title: Ethereum Dev Virgil Griffith Gets Five Years in Prison for North Korea Trip

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: New Fidelity crypto and metaverse ETFs will invest in tech and digital payments companies, but not offer direct exposure to cryptocurrencies.
articles.title: What Fidelity’s Crypto and Metaverse ETFs Will Mean for Investors

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Popular trading app Robinhood listed several more cryptocurrencies today. Meme coin Shiba Inu is one of them—and buy orders have rushed in.
articles.title: Shiba Inu (SHIB) Jumps 20% Following Robinhood Listing

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The retired NASA astronaut—who holds BTC, DOGE, and more—tells Decrypt about his first NFTs and excitement for the metaverse.
articles.title: To The Moon: Astronaut Scott Kelly Launches Ethereum NFTs to Benefit Ukraine

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The ASAI is considering a review of digital assets promotions, potentially leading to a clampdown on crypto ads.
articles.title: Ireland's Advertising Regulator to Review Crypto Ads Guidance

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Sky Mavis has offered a top prize of $1,000,000 for hackers who can identify “extraordinarily severe” vulnerabilities.
articles.title: Axie Infinity Developer Launches $1M Bug Bounty After $622M Ronin Hack

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: A trial will enable a ‘handful’ of Horizon creators to sell virtual items to the VR app’s 300,000 monthly users.
articles.title: Meta Will Enable VR Creators to Sell Virtual Items in Horizon Worlds

articles.description: Retired NASA astronaut Scott Kelly talks to Decrypt’s Andrew Hayward about his new Ethereum NFT collection, which benefits relief efforts in Ukraine, plus the cryptocurrencies he holds and his excitement about the metaverse.
articles.title: Astronaut Scott Kelly Discusses NFT Project, Crypto Holdings, and the Metaverse

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Courtside Ventures and Alpaca VC led the funding round, joined by Vaynerchuk, DraftKings CEO Jason Robins and several others.
articles.title: Gary Vaynerchuk-Backed Swoops Raises $3.5 Million for NFT Basketball Game

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Crypto trading platform Robinhood has listed the popular meme coin Shiba Inu (SHIB) alongside Solana and others.
articles.title: Robinhood Adds SHIB, Solana, Compound and Polygon's MATIC

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase has unveiled an extended list of tokens under consideration for listing in Q2 2022.
articles.title: Coinbase 'Increasing Transparency' for New Listings with Q2 Asset Roadmap

articles.author: Decrypt Staff
articles.description: Bitcoin and Ethereum have both recovered key levels, even as the global crypto market cap slipped further overnight.
articles.title: Bitcoin Recovers $40,000 Amid Wider Crypto Market Slump

articles.description: Gemini COO Noah Perlman talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Bitcoin Miami 2022 about Gemini's approach to competing with other exchanges, its focus on regulatory compliance, and his own views on Bitcoin maximalists.
articles.title: Gemini COO Talks to Decrypt at Bitcoin Miami 2022

articles.description: Robinhood Crypto CTO Johann Kerbrat talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Bitcoin Miami 2022 about Robinhood's new Lightning Network integration, potential NFT plans, and Kerbrat's personal history with crypto, including mining Bitcoin back in 2010.
articles.title: Robinhood Crypto CTO Talks to Decrypt at Bitcoin Miami 2022

articles.description: Emily Yang aka pplpleasr never thought she'd be an online celebrity. But in 2021 an NFT version of a digital ad she did for Uniswap sold for $525,000 to a DAO of her fans, and now she's among the most famous NFT artists. She speaks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about the rise of NFT art, the traditional art world taking it seriously, NFT haters, and which NFT marketplaces can beat OpenSea.
articles.title: gm Podcast, Episode 6: pplpleasr and the NFT Art Revolution

articles.description: The legendary rapper, actor, and entrepreneur Ice Cube talks to Decrypt's Andrew Hayward about why his BIG3 basketball league plans to offer fractional team ownership in the form of NFTs, plus his personal interest in crypto.
articles.title: Ice Cube: Crypto and NFTs Are ‘The Ultimate Fuck You to the Mainstream’

articles.description: Tax Day is coming, and the crypto world is paying attention. Decrypt's Jeff Roberts, Stacy Elliott, and Adriana Hamacher discuss what people and businesses need to know about crypto and taxes with special guest Nicholas Mowbray of Baker Hostetler.
articles.title: #DecryptLIVE: Crypto, Taxes, and You

articles.description: Caitlin Long spent nearly two decades at big banks Credit Suisse and Morgan Stanley before she went all in on Bitcoin. Now her company Custodia is seeking to offer banking services to crypto companies long shut out by the big banks. She talks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about identifying as a Bitcoin maximalist, crypto regulation in DC, and Web3 culture.
articles.title: gm Podcast, Episode 6: Ditching Big Banks for Bitcoin With Caitlin Long

articles.description: Politicians are embracing crypto on both sides of the aisle. Matt West, running for congress in Oregon, Matthew Diemer, running for congress in Ohio, and former Wyoming Rep. Tyler Lindholm discussed crypto and politics on a panel with Decrypt's Jeff Roberts at Camp Ethereal in Wyoming. As Diemer pointed out, "We have a conservative Republican, a progressive Democrat, and a moderate Democrat on the same stage, unified by crypto and the idea of making sensible regulation."
articles.title: Crypto on the Campaign Trail: Matt West, Matthew Diemer, Tyler Lindholm at Camp Ethereal 2022

articles.description: Tax season is upon us, and crypto investors have questions. Tony Dhanjal, Head of Tax at crypto tax software service Koinly, shares tips in this sponsored segment.
articles.title: Crypto Taxes Got You Down? Software Can Help

articles.description: Anthony Georgiades, co-founder of Pastel Network, talks to Decrypt's Andrew Hayward at Camp Ethereal 2022 about NFT security and the importance of protecting your digital artwork.
articles.title: Pastel Network's Georgiades: How to Protect Your NFTs

articles.description: Andrew Yang, the former presidential and NYC mayoral candidate, talked crypto regulation in DC on Decrypt's gm podcast with Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts. Yang says the days of little or no crypto regulation in DC are "very very quickly coming to end" and that the question now is what the new rules will look like.
articles.title: Andrew Yang on Crypto Regulation in DC: 'This Train Is Coming. What's the Cargo?'

articles.description: Gitcoin co-founder Scott Moore tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson all about Gitcoin's GR13 grant, which is raising money for Ukraine and has matching participation from a range of Web3 names like OpenSea, OlympusDAO, NounsDAO, Polygon, Algorand, and more.
articles.title: Gitcoin's Scott Moore Talks Ukraine Fundraising Grant

articles.description: Robert Drost, Head of R&D at ConsenSys, talks Layer 2s and building atop Ethereum with James Prestwich of Nomad and Sreeram Kannan of LayrLabs at Camp Ethereal 2022 in Wyoming.
articles.title: The Importance of Layer 2: ConsenSys, Nomad, and LayrLabs at Camp Ethereal

articles.description: Jordan Garbis, co-founder of BeetsDAO, and Kent Barton, who does tokenomics at ShapeShift DAO, talk to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Camp Ethereal 2022 in Wyoming about how to start a DAO, the hurdles with growing them, how to handle tokenomics and reward structure, and how to approach bad behavior by DAO members. At the end, they also took questions from the audience.
articles.title: ShapeShift, BeetsDAO Talk DAO Creation and Governance at Camp Ethereal

articles.description: The former presidential candidate and NYC mayoral candidate has launched Lobby3, a DC lobbying DAO. He talks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about his crypto journey, the potential of DAOs, and the need to blend a Web3 approach with "the old-fashioned way" to spur change in DC.
articles.title: gm Podcast, Episode 5: Andrew Yang Wants You to Join His DAO
